q: sagte Eric Schmidt zum Abschluss der Internet-Konferenz DLD( Digital, Life, Design).`` Aus diesen Gr?nden werden wir weiter investieren.'' Mit Blick auf den Wettbewerb mit neuen Internet-Schwergewichten wie Facebook sagte Eric Schmidt : Die Internet-Suche wird weiter sehr wichtig bleiben. Dies gelte vor allem mit Blick auf die immer schnellere Verbreitung von mobilen Ger?ten. Google verdient sein Geld vor allem mit der Platzierung von Werbung in den Ergebnissen seiner Internet-Suchmaschine.`` Ger?te ohne Anschluss ans Internet

The performance left David Letterman speechless, and it will be interesting to see if`` the sweet lady with the nasty voice'' and her cohorts can outdo themselves on TV tonight. a 2007 appearance on the`` Late Show,'' host David Letterman asked Keith Olbermann ,`` What is it about you? You seem to burn bridges wherever you leave.'' said of his relationship with ESPN, I don't burn bridges, I burn rivers. If you burn a bridge, you can possibly build a new bridge, but if there's no river any more, that's a lot of trouble. I just try to run the place. air are all but silenced.`` The show has experienced year-to-year declines of about 10 percent for the last several seasons now, so everyone expected ratings to drop,'' a TV insider tells me. The only question was how much they drop. And although the show did drop, it still produced huge numbers easily beating all its competition. Last week's episode was actually up from last Thursday's episode by nearly 18 percent, and was down only 9 percent from the equivalent episode last year. href="http://www.popeater.com/2010/11/25/Simon Cowell-Simon Cowell-Steven Tyler-Tyler Perry-american-idol"> Simon Cowell Pokes Fun at` Idol' Judge Steven Tyler href="http://www.popeater.com/2010/09/22/american-idol-Jennifer Lopez-Jennifer Lopez-Steven Tyler-Tyler Perry-judges">` American Idol' Confirms Jennifer Lopez , Steven Tyler as New Judges href="http://www.popeater.com/2010/08/19/Steven Tyler-Tyler Perry-american-idol-judge"> Steven Tyler Tells Friend He's an` American Idol' Judge

shake-up. Current Google CEO Eric Schmidt will serve as the company's executive chairman. Co-founder Sergey Brin will devote his time to strategic projects, in particular working on new products, the company said. We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time, Eric Schmidt said in a statement.`` By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited
